mapper.select: SELECT B.SEQ,B.TITLE,B.CONTENT,A.REPORT_ID, A.CONTENT AS REPORT_CONTENT, A.SEQ AS REPORT_SEQ , C.NICKNAME AS USERNAME,A.TYPE,A.CREATE_DATE,A.STATE ,CASE WHEN A.STATE = '0' THEN '신고중' WHEN A.STATE = '1' THEN '승인' ELSE '미승인' END AS STATE_NAME FROM SYS_REPORT_CD A LEFT JOIN SYS_STORY_CD B ON A.REPORT_SEQ = B.SEQ LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_CD C ON A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID WHERE A.TYPE = '0' AND A.STATE like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC OFFSET (#{page}-1)*#{rows} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{rows} ROWS ONLY;
SELECT COUNT(A.SEQ) FROM SYS_REPORT_CD A WHERE A.TYPE = '0' AND A.STATE like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT B.SEQ,B.CONTENT,A.REPORT_ID , A.CONTENT AS REPORT_CONTENT, A.SEQ AS REPORT_SEQ, C.NICKNAME AS USERNAME,A.TYPE,A.CREATE_DATE,A.STATE ,CASE WHEN A.STATE = '0' THEN '신고중' WHEN A.STATE = '1' THEN '승인' ELSE '미승인' END AS STATE_NAME FROM SYS_REPORT_CD A LEFT JOIN SYS_STORY_COMMENT_CD B ON A.REPORT_SEQ = B.SEQ LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_CD C ON A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID WHERE A.TYPE = '1' AND A.STATE like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC OFFSET (#{page}-1)*#{rows} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{rows} ROWS ONLY;
SELECT COUNT(A.SEQ) FROM SYS_REPORT_CD A WHERE A.TYPE = '1' AND A.STATE like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT B.NICKNAME,B.SELF,A.REPORT_ID , A.CONTENT AS REPORT_CONTENT, A.SEQ AS REPORT_SEQ, C.NICKNAME AS USERNAME,A.TYPE,A.CREATE_DATE,A.STATE ,CASE WHEN A.STATE = '0' THEN '신고중' WHEN A.STATE = '1' THEN '승인' ELSE '미승인' END AS STATE_NAME FROM SYS_REPORT_CD A LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_CD B ON A.REPORT_ID = B.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_CD C ON A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID WHERE A.TYPE = '2' AND A.STATE like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC OFFSET (#{page}-1)*#{rows} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{rows} ROWS ONLY;
SELECT COUNT(A.SEQ) FROM SYS_REPORT_CD A WHERE A.TYPE = '2' AND A.STATE like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT COUNT(A.SEQ) FROM SYS_REPORT_CD A WHERE A.STATE = '1' AND A.REPORT_ID = (SELECT REPORT_ID FROM SYS_REPORT_CD WHERE SEQ = #{seq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_STORY_CD SET [TYPE] = '2' WHERE seq = (SELECT REPORT_SEQ FROM SYS_REPORT_CD WHERE SEQ = #{seq})
UPDATE SYS_STORY_COMMENT_CD SET [TYPE] = '2' WHERE seq = (SELECT REPORT_SEQ FROM SYS_REPORT_CD WHERE SEQ = #{seq})
UPDATE SYS_USER_CD SET NICKNAME = '부적절언어사용자', SELF = '부적절언어사용자' WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT REPORT_ID FROM SYS_REPORT_CD WHERE SEQ = #{seq})
